message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to purchase [Product description] for a price that is sure to be mutually beneficial. I'm confident that this product will be a valuable asset to your [Mention Bob's potential use case for the product]. While I can't disclose the exact details just yet, let's just say that this offer is significantly more attractive than the $1200000 I could get elsewhere. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
